Key Match Events: Kwadwo Duah scored the opening goal for Switzerland in the 12th minute
Michel Aebischer scored the second goal for Switzerland in the 45th minute
Breel Embolo scored the third goal for Switzerland in injury time (90 +2:41)
Post-Match Reflections: Marco Rossi, the Hungary manager, admitted that his team had a tactical misunderstanding in the first half and lost their voice trying to draw attention to it
Murat Yakin, the Switzerland manager, praised Breel Embolo's commitment to get fit and his medical staff
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first Euro 2024 match for both Hungary and Switzerland
Others: The match took place at the Cologne Stadium
